name: Novotel Muenchen City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was in a good location just outside of the centre of Munich on a quiet side road. It has all the features you would expect from a chain hotel. Service and staff were excellent as is the bar and restaurant.
reviews.title: Quality Efficient Hotel

reviews.text: Very easy to commute around Munich from here since there was a well signposted underground station near by. There is also a tram to get into town.
reviews.title: Clean contemporary style hotel

likes.disliked: — Distance from City Centre, kids being allowed to use the gym

reviews.text: Would stay at this place again and recommend to future travelers.
reviews.title: Unfriendly staff but spacious rooms and nice location

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights in July 08. The hotel is a very contemporary style and very clean. Our room was quite small for four people. There was a double bed for my husband and I and a sofabed for my two children. I called down to reception after seeing the room and asked if they had a larger room for us but was told that I would have to pay 70 Euro extra per night and it was double the size of our room. We thought about it but decided to remain in the smaller room and save the money. We paid 17 Euro each for breakfast (kids were free) which is expensive but it is an excellent buffet breakfast. Eggs, sausages, potatoes, waffles, pastries, cold cuts, fruit, juices, coffee, tea etc. If you just have coffee and a muffin for breakfast then you should go out of the hotel to a coffee shop but if you like to eat a big breakfast, it is worth the 17 Euro to eat here.
reviews.title: A surprisingly excellent hotel

reviews.text: There is a small indoor pool and a small gym that opens at around 6am and closes at 11pm. My kids used the pool almost every night. During the week it was empty but when it came to the weekend, it got very busy there. I used the gym but on one of the nights the weight equipment was broken as a child had used it incorrectly and tangled the wires. There is apparently no age requirement to use the gym in Germany like in the USA, so young kids were in the gym messing around on the treadmill and the weights. This was not good as there is only one treadmill and one epiliptical machine so if they are on it, you can't use it. I only had this problem at the weekend. During the week, I had the gym to myself. It is also very dangerous for little kids to use the gym as they don't know how to use weights and the equipment. I'm very surprised that there is no age requirement. The other problem I had was that there were 2 computers in the lobby to use free of charge but one of them was out of order for the whole 5 days I was there. There were always people waiting to use the computer. There was a very angry man who was trying to print out his boarding pass and said that everytime he came down from his room, the computer was being used. If you want to use the computer, you have to stay there in line. I complained to the front desk that I needed to check my flight information and that a person was on the computer for a long time. The receptionist asked the person to allow me to check my flight info and they did.
reviews.title: We liked this Novotel

reviews.text: Just stayed 3 nights wonderful nights at the Novotel München City hotel in a Superior Room with 1 double bed and 1 single bed. 2 adults, 1 child 15 years old.
reviews.title: The best service and staff ever!

reviews.text: All the staff - from reception to cleaning - were exstremely friendly and efficient. The best we have ever experienced and we travel a lot!
reviews.title: Great Value Family rooms

likes.disliked: — Childrens play area off reception area was a mess!

reviews.title: Modern clean central
reviews.text: The room is very nice and very clean. There is not much room if you are 3 but it´s just fine. The only thing about the room is that the toilet is seperate from the bathroom. Would have liked to be able to wash hands in same room as toilet.
Breakfast is very good! It is a little expensive but worth it. Our son was free.
reviews.title: Great value in the heart of the city

likes.liked: — Rooms, pool and front desk service

reviews.text: Location is fine. It is a little walk to the center of town though, approx. 20 min. But only 5 min. from S-bahn.
reviews.title: Loved the Novotel Munich City Center- clean- modern hotel

likes.liked: — Clean modern hotel - great front desk help

reviews.text: With spacious, clean rooms and only a 15 minute walk away from Marienplatz, I am definitely going to stay again in this hotel.
reviews.title: Best breakfast ever.

reviews.text: The restaurant was also very good.
reviews.title: ideal location

reviews.text: We have stayed here a couple of times and for us is an ideal location, only 5 minutes walk from the S Bahn from the airport and 15 minutes to the centre. The hotel is a short walk to the beer garden Muffathalle by the River Isar where its a pleasant walk to the English Garden taking an hour [with young kids]. We were room only and the breakfast too costly for us but theres a petrol station next door for a pastry or theres an Aldi round the corner. Down sides are the noisy tour groups which decend daily making the queues at the lift often unbearable but overall its a good place to stay.
reviews.title: The walk will do you good!

reviews.text: This hotel was good value, with easy access from the airport - S1 or S8 trains go to the station just round the corner. The decor throughout was clean, modern and bright and the desk staff were polite and friendly.
reviews.title: good base to explore munich

reviews.text: The rooms are big by european standards, the bathrooms are more compact but clean and well maintained - the only negative were the uncomfortable pillows that squashed down to nothing as soon as you put your head on them, but this might not be a problem for everyone.
reviews.title: Very suitable for the family

reviews.text: This is a very comfortable 4 star hotel right in the centre of Munich. There are bars and restaurants almost on the doorstep and the old town & Marienplatz are only an easy walk away.
reviews.title: As with all Novotels these days, watch for the hidden costs!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not dine in the hotel or have breakfast, so we can’t comment on these. We had one drink in the bar and it seemed fine.
reviews.title: good hotel, tasty breakfast, not nice location.

reviews.text: We got a good room rate, but the thing with Novotels now is that they get you with the add-on costs. We managed to avoid the EUR19 per person breakfast, but they got us with EUR 17 for overnight parking – seventeen Euros to park from 18:00 to 09:00 the next morning! Just as well we weren’t staying longer.
reviews.title: Good hotel in the center of Munich

reviews.text: The hotel overall was good, very clean, the breakfast was really tasty and the room modern with separate bathroom and WC. The hotel has fitness center and a tiny swimming pool, which was all the time full of kids, so it was difficult to make a dip. The location is not so central- around 1,5 Km to Marienplatz- and has almost nothing around to go out at night. The value for money was great!
reviews.title: Nice hotel in Munich

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights. By booking ahead we got a pretty good rate especially for this location. Hotel is within 15 minute walk of Marienplatz. You have variety of restaurants and supermarkets along the way to the center.
reviews.title: Excelent Hotel in Munich. Rates is resonable with this Hotel. Pleasant Stay.

description: Located right on the Isar River, the new Novotel Munchen City is 10 km from the exhibition centre and just a few minutes walk from the train line and attractions such as the Deutsche Museum, Gasteig Cultural Centre and Marienplatz. Our 307 rooms and conference rooms for up to 210 people feature a design concept for the future with bright colours, natural materials and ergonomic forms. Revitalise in our spa centre with indoor pool, sauna and steam bath. This 4 star hotel also features a parking garage.
